nodes.text: The Zero Angle was the only cantina of the Galactic Empire's Bright Jewel Oversector Flight Base. While other flight bases had separate bars for groundhogs (atmospheric pilots) and vac-heads (space pilots), both groups gathered at the Zero Angle, which sometimes led to friction. Around the time of the Battle of Yavin, the bar was tended by Florn, a former pilot who had been injured in a crash.
